alert.note: Alert for Hampton, Poquoson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 08 at 5:36AM EST until November 09 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Hampton/Poquoson County. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 3 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Shallow flooding is expected in the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline resulting in a low threat of property damage. Expect up to one foot of water above ground level in low lying, vulnerable areas. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks and lawns near the waterfront will experience shallow flooding. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. FORT MONROE VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.2 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 08/09 AM 4.6 1.8 1.4 3-4 MINOR 08/09 PM 4.2 1.4 1.6 4 NONE 09/09 AM 4.8 2.0 1.6 4 MINOR 09/10 PM 3.7 0.9 1.2 3 NONE 10/10 AM 4.0 1.2 1.0 2 NONE 10/10 PM 3.2 0.4 0.8 2 NONE SEWELLS POINT VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.7 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 08/08 AM 4.5 1.7 1.4 3-4 MINOR 08/09 PM 4.1 1.3 1.6 4 NONE 09/09 AM 4.8 2.0 1.7 4 MINOR 09/09 PM 3.7 0.9 1.3 3 NONE 10/10 AM 4.0 1.2 1.0 2 NONE 10/10 PM 3.2 0.4 0.8 2 NONE &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
